title: Cauldron 1.7.10 发布
author: aa210063654
txt_content:
本帖最后由 aa210063654 于 2014-7-7 18:29 编辑 

原文如下: (链接)
After a week of work, I'm proud to release the 1.7.10 update of Cauldron.

Along with the MC update to 1.7.10, the following has been updated :

Forge has been updated to 10.13.0.1169
Bukkit has been updated to 1.7.9-R0.3

Due to the amount of changes with this update, expect bugs =)

Grab the first build 1.1169.03.92 here http://files.minecraftforge.net/Cauldron/

And don't forget, support the project!

http://www.patreon.com/bloodmc for information on how to support me with Cauldron
残渣手动翻译:
经过一周的努力..作者把Cauldron更新到了1.7.10.
随着Mc更新到了1.7.10,Bukkit和Forge分别更新到了Bukkit 1.7.9-R0.3,Forge 10.13.0.1169.

顺便提下..由于变化量太大,所以Bug估计也蛮多的..

下载链接:http://files.minecraftforge.net/Cauldron/

捐赠作者:http://www.patreon.com/bloodmc

分流:
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-282081-1-1.html

注:
Cauldron的前身是MCPC...也就是说,Cauldron目前稳定的,可以装MOD和Bukkit插件的服务端
